title: Zaidi questions on Hussain Haqqani’s appointment as envoy
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 23 (APP): Federal Minister for Maritime Affairs Ali Haider Zaidi Wednesday quested former president Asif Ali Zardari to explain as to why Hussain Haqqani was appointed as ambassador without due diligence.
Taking to twitter, he further asked, “Is being anti-state a selection criteria for PPP?”
Hussain Haqqani seen here sitting with Gen. Rawat Bipen in India.HH was part of the Anti-Pak campaign by India, recently exposed by @DisinfoEU Asif Zardari must explain why HH was appointed as Ambassador w/out due-diligence!Is being anti-state a selection criteria for PPP? pic.twitter.com/sJ5LbF8Gdk
— Ali Haider Zaidi (@AliHZaidiPTI) December 23, 2020
He said Hussain Haqqani was part of the anti-Pakistan campaign by India, recently exposed by @DisinfoEU.
The minister also posted a photo of Hussain Haqqani on his recent visit to India sitting besides Indian armed forces CDS Gen Rawat Bipen.
